serviceStatus.description: Àkókò ìṣiṣẹ́ láàárín ọjọ́ 90 sẹ́yìn. Ń ṣe àbójútó gbogbo iṣẹ́ pàtàkì.

monitoring.title: Nipa Abojuto Wa
monitoring.response: Awon akoko idahun ti a won lati opo ibi
monitoring.history: Data itan ti a fi pamọ fun ojo 90
monitoring.alerts: Awọn ikilọ adaṣe fun awọn idaduro iṣẹ

help.title: Ṣe O Nilo Iranlọwọ?
help.followUs: Tẹle wa fun awọn imudojuiwọn akoko gidi nipa ipo iṣẹ

invite.title: Pe Oniwunti Iṣowo
invite.description1: Ṣe o mọ oniwunti iṣowo ti o n wa lati mu awọn iṣẹ wọn ṣiṣẹ daradara? Pin Dott pẹlu wọn!
invite.description2: Dott n ṣe iranlọwọ fun awọn iṣowo lati ṣe adaṣe eto akoko, ṣakoso awọn ibasepọ alabara ati ṣe awọn sisanwo - gbogbo ninu ohun elo kan ti o rọrun. Isọpọ rẹ le fi awọn wakati iṣẹ iṣakoso pamọ ni ọsẹ kọọkan.
invite.phoneHelperText: Pẹlu koodu orilẹ-ede (fun apẹẹrẹ, +1 fun US, +234 fun Nigeria)
invite.emailValidationError: Jọwọ tẹ adirẹsi imeeli to tọ sii.
invite.phoneValidationError: Jọwọ tẹ nọmba foonu to tọ sii.
invite.successMessage: Ifiwepe ti ranṣẹ ni aṣeyọri nipasẹ {{method}} si {{recipient}}!
invite.errorMessage: Kuna lati fi ifiwepe ranṣẹ. Jọwọ gbiyanju lẹẹkansi.
invite.networkError: Aṣiṣe nẹtiwọọki. Jọwọ ṣayẹwo asopọ rẹ ki o gbiyanju lẹẹkansi.
invite.emailMessage:
Pẹlẹ o,

{{senderName}} ti pe ọ lati gbiyanju Dott, ohun elo gbogbo-ninu-ọkan lati mu awọn iṣẹ iṣowo rọrun.

Kini idi ti awọn oniwunti iṣowo ṣe nifẹ Dott?
✓ Ṣiṣe awọn ikọṣilẹ adaṣe ati iṣakoso sisanwo
✓ Ṣiṣeto ipade ati awọn iranti alabara
✓ Titọpa ija-ọja ati iṣakoso awọn olupese
✓ Ṣiṣẹ sisanwo oṣu ati awọn ijabọ ori-owo
✓ Awọn oye iṣowo ati awọn itupalẹ

Bẹrẹ idanwo ọfẹ rẹ loni:
https://dottapps.com

Ki o dara,
Egbe Dott
invite.whatsappMessage:

{{senderName}} ti pe ọ lati gbiyanju Dott, ohun elo gbogbo-ninu-ọkan lati mu awọn iṣẹ iṣowo rọrun.

✓ Iṣakoso ija-ọja
✓ Ṣiṣẹ sisanwo oṣu

smartInsights.title: Awọn Oye Ọgbọn
smartInsights.subtitle: Oluranlọwọ ọgbọn iṣowo ti AI n ṣiṣẹ

chat.askAnything: Beere mi ohunkohun nipa data iṣowo rẹ

revenue.title: Owo-wiwọle ati Tita
revenue.query1: Fi aṣa owo-wiwọle mi han pẹlu aworan
revenue.query2: Awọn ọja wo ni o ta julọ? Pẹlu aworan
revenue.query3: Ṣẹda aworan tita nipasẹ apakan alabara
revenue.query4: Kini aṣa iye aṣẹ apapọ mi?

customers.title: Awọn Oye Alabara
customers.query1: Fi awọn alabara to ga julọ mi han ninu aworan
customers.query2: Kini oṣuwọn idaduro alabara mi? Fi han bi aworan ogorun
customers.query3: Ṣẹda ifihan ti awọn alabara tuntun vs awọn ti n pada
customers.query4: Awọn alabara wo ni o wa ninu ewu? Pẹlu aworan itupalẹ

inventory.title: Itupalẹ Iṣura
inventory.query1: Awọn ọja wo ni o nilo atunṣe? Fi han ninu aworan
inventory.query2: Ṣe afihan awọn oṣuwọn iyipo iṣura
inventory.query3: Ṣẹda aworan ti awọn nkan ti n lọ laiyara vs yiyara
inventory.query4: Fi pinpin iye iṣura lọwọlọwọ mi han

performance.title: Iṣẹ Iṣowo
performance.query1: Bawo ni iṣowo mi ṣe n ṣiṣẹ? Pẹlu awọn aworan
performance.query2: Ṣe afiwe oṣu yii pẹlu oṣu to kọja pẹlu awọn ifihan
performance.query3: Fi awọn ala ere mi han ninu aworan

buyCredits.title: Ra Awọn Kirẹditi Oye Ọgbọn
buyCredits.description: Yan idii kirẹditi lati tẹsiwaju lilo Awọn Oye Ọgbọn

errors.noCredits: Ko si awọn kirẹditi to ku. Jọwọ ra awọn kirẹditi diẹ sii.
errors.initFailed: Ibẹrẹ kuna. Jọwọ sọ oju-iwe di otun.
errors.processingError: Ma binu, mo ba aṣiṣe pade nigba ti mo n ṣiṣẹ ibeere rẹ. Jọwọ gbiyanju lẹẹkansi.
errors.loadingError: Aṣiṣe ninu gbigbe Awọn Oye Ọgbọn
